availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Dixon Price Jr. (Logan County, Kentucky, farm laborer.)

body.p: Logan County, Kentucky, farm laborer. Son of William Dixon Price Senior and Susan Price. Resident of Logan County, Kentucky in 1850. Farm laborer in Logan County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan, District 1, p. 29A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan, District 1, p. 469.
Find A Grave, "W. D. Price (1842-1882)," Memorial #68752877, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/68752877 (accessed August 10, 2019).
